title: Adjusting volume while using a BT device effectvly Doubles the % of the change. Any way to fix?
content:
When I adjst the vol while listening via a BT device, both the phone AND the device (headset, adaptor, etc) make the incr/decr, thus doubling the size (8% vs 4%) of the change.
Is it possible to turn off the sharing of control inputs, specifically the Volume, between the source (phone) and the receiver (headset, adaptr, etc)? 
Either That, or reduce the % of change from the 4% default to 1% or 2%?
